availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Parke County, Indiana, judge. Indiana native. Married to M. P. Bryant. Father of Robert T. Bryant, William P. Bryant, Sarah M. Bryant, Emily J. Bryant, John L. Bryant, and L. Howard Bryant. Judge of the Common Pleas Court in Parke County in 1858.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Parke County, District No. 85, p. 276b. George W. Hawes, G. W. Hawes' Indiana State Gazetteer and Business Directory For 1858 and 1859 (Indianapolis: Geo. W. Hawes, 1858), 582.
